configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Configure your AWS account, proxy settings and logging level

validators.errorMsg: Length of Name is restricted from 1 to 50.
Characters of Name should start with alphanumeric and contain alphanumeric, space, dash, underscore or comma only.
Length of Name is restricted from 1 to 50.
Characters of Name should start with alphanumeric and contain alphanumeric, space, dash, underscore or comma only.

entity.label: AWS Region
entity.help: Selected region will be used for api calls of STS service

validators.errorMsg: Length of Name is restricted from 1 to 50.
Characters of Name should match regex ^\w+$ .
Characters of Name should match regex ^arn:[^\s:]+:iam::\d+:role(:|/)[^\s]+$ .

entity.label: CloudWatch Max Threads
entity.help: Specify the count to determine the number of thread workers that will operate concurrently to retrieve data for CloudWatch input dimensions.
entity.tooltip: Tune the thread count according to the system specifications. Updating the thread count can lead to increased CPU and Memory utilization.

validators.errorMsg: Only numbers are supported

entity.label: Host
entity.tooltip: Hostname: www.example.com or IPv4: 192.0.1.1 or IPv6: [1111:2222:3333:4444:CCCC:DDDD:EEEE:FFFF]

options.saveValidator: function(formData) { if(!formData.proxy_enabled || formData.proxy_enabled === '0') {return true; } if (!formData.proxy_type) {return 'Input of "Proxy Type" can not be empty';} if(!formData.host) { return 'Input of "Host" can not be empty'; } if(!formData.port) { return 'Input of "Port" can not be empty'; } return true; }

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: Create data inputs to collect data from AWS

subDescription.text:
Ingesting data from AWS to Splunk Cloud? Have you tried the new Splunk Data Manager yet?
Data Manager makes AWS data ingestion simpler, more automated and centrally managed for you, while co-existing with AWS and/or Kinesis TAs.
Read our [[blogPost]] to learn more about Data Manager and it's availability on your Splunk Cloud instance.

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: AWS Region
entity.help: Select region only if you want to use regional/private endpoints for making every API calls.

entity.label: Report Name Pattern
entity.tooltip: A regular expression used to filter reports by name, leave blank to select all reports in this bucket.

entity.label: Temp Folder
entity.tooltip: Full path to a non-default folder with sufficient space for temporarily storing downloaded detailed billing report .zip files.

validators.errorMsg: Please enter a correct date format. e.g., 2000-01
Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: Exclude Read-only Events
entity.tooltip: A boolean value indicating whether or not to exclude certain events, such as read-only events that can produce a high volume of data.

entity.label: Blacklist for Exclusion
entity.tooltip: A PCRE regular expression that specifies event names to if exclude_describe_events is set to true. Leave blank to use the default regex, ^(?:Describe|List|Get).

entity.label: Excluded Events Index
entity.tooltip: The name of the index in which the Splunk platform should put excluded events. Default is empty, which discards the events.

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Only letters, numbers and underscores are supported for the Input Name and it should not start with numbers and underscores.

entity.label: Use Private Endpoints
entity.help: If enabled, User provided private endpoints will be used while making API calls to AWS services.

entity.label: Start date/time
entity.help: Start date/time should be in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'(UTC) format.(Default is 7 days ago.).

entity.label: End date/time
entity.help: End date/time should be in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'(UTC) format.

entity.label: Query Window Size (minutes)
entity.help: Specify how many minute's worth of data to query each request.

validators.errorMsg: Only numbers are supported

entity.label: Delay Throttle (minutes)
entity.help: CloudTrail typically delivers events within an average of about 5 minutes of an API call. This time is not guaranteed.

validators.errorMsg: Only numbers are supported
Interval (in seconds) must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
Interval (in seconds) must be between 1 and 31536000
Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: Use Private Endpoints
entity.tooltip: Private endpoints are optional. Please provide endpoints based on selected metric configurations.

entity.label: Polling Interval (in seconds)
entity.help: Input a number multiple of "Granularity" field.

entity.label: Period
entity.tooltip: The granularity, in seconds, of the returned data points. The period can be as short as one minute (60 seconds) and must be a multiple of 60

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: Log Group
entity.tooltip: A comma-separated list of log group names.

validators.errorMsg: Please enter a correct date format. e.g., 1970-01-01T00:00:00

entity.label: Stream Matching Regex
entity.tooltip: REGEX to strictly match stream names. Defaults to .*

entity.label: Query Window Size (minutes)
entity.help: Specify the interval of data to be collected in each request(in minutes). Min=1 & Max=43200(30days)

validators.errorMsg: Field Query Window Size (minutes) should be a number(without decimal) within the range of [1 and 43200]

entity.label: Retry Max Attempts
entity.help: Specify the maximum number of retry attempts, if there is an error in the response of a request.

validators.errorMsg: Retry Max Attempts must be a non-zero positive integer.

create.message: Amazon S3 buckets with an excessive number of files or abundant size will result in significant performance degradation and ingestion delays. Configure an SQS-Based S3 input to achieve efficiency.

edit.message: Amazon S3 buckets with an excessive number of files or abundant size will result in significant performance degradation and ingestion delays. Configure an SQS-Based S3 input to achieve efficiency.

clone.message: Amazon S3 buckets with an excessive number of files or abundant size will result in significant performance degradation and ingestion delays. Configure an SQS-Based S3 input to achieve efficiency.

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: AWS Region
entity.help: Select region only if you want to use regional endpoints for making every API calls.

entity.label: Parse all files as CSV
entity.tooltip: All files will be parsed as CSV with the first line considered the header.
entity.help: Set this checkbox to disabled for delimited files without a header.

entity.label: CSV field delimiter
entity.tooltip: Delimiter must be one character. The character cannot be alphanumeric, single quote, or double quote. Tab-delimited files will be \t. Space-delimited files will be \s

validators.errorMsg: Length of the delimiter is restricted to 1 character.
Delimiter must be one character. The character cannot be empty, alphanumeric, single quote, or double quote.
Please enter a correct date format. e.g., 2000-01-01T00:00:00Z
Please enter a correct date format. e.g., 2000-01-01T00:00:00Z

entity.label: CloudTrail Event Blacklist
entity.tooltip: A PCRE regular expression that specifies event names to exclude. The default regex is ^$ to exclude events that can produce a high volume of data. Leave it blank if you want all data to be indexed.

entity.label: Blacklist
entity.tooltip: A regular expression to indicate the S3 paths that the Splunk platform should exclude from scanning. Regex should match the path starting from folder name.
entity.help: For example, for excluding contents of folder Test, provide regex as Test/.*

entity.label: Whitelist
entity.tooltip: A regular expression to indicate the S3 paths the Splunk platform should scan. Regex should match the path starting from folder name. Whitelist overrides blacklist.
entity.help: For example, for including contents of folder Test, provide regex as Test/.*

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: AWS Region
entity.help: Select region only if you want to use regional endpoints for making every API calls.

entity.label: Log File Prefix
entity.tooltip: Configure the prefix of the log file. This add-on will search the log files under this prefix. The locations of the log files are different for each S3 incremental log type.

validators.errorMsg: Please enter a correct date format. e.g., 2000-01-01

entity.label: Log Path Format
entity.help: S3 Bucket log file path for Account Level: '<prefix/AWSLogs/<account_id>/Cloudtrail/>' & for Organization level: '<prefix/AWSLogs/<org_id>/<account_id>/Cloudtrail/>'

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$
Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Name must begin with a letter and consist exclusively of alphanumeric characters and underscores.
Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: Initial Stream Position
entity.tooltip: LATEST or TRIM_HORIZON. LATEST starts data collection from the point the input is enabled. TRIM_HORIZON starts collecting with the oldest data record.

entity.label: Encoding
entity.tooltip: The encoding of the stream data. Set to gzip or leave blank, which defaults to Base64. All stream data that you collect in a single input must have the same encoding.

entity.label: Record Format
entity.tooltip: CloudWatchLogs or none. If you choose CloudWatchLogs, this add-on will parse the data in CloudWatchLogs format.

validators.errorMsg: Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$
Field Name must be less than 256 characters
Please enter name without special characters ^%<>/\^$

entity.label: Force using DLQ (Recommended)
entity.tooltip: Deselect the checkbox if some data like 'Crowdstrike FDR' data is to be fetched as dead letter queue is not linked to some services like Crowdstrike supported queues

entity.label: SQS Queue Name
entity.tooltip: SQS queue with dead letter queue setting (recommended) and visibility timeout no smaller than 300s (recommended)

entity.label: SQS Batch Size
entity.tooltip: Max number of messages to pull from SQS in one batch. An integer in range [1, 10].

entity.label: Signature Validate All Events
entity.tooltip: SQS Queue with mix of signed and unsigned messages are not supported.

entity.label: Event Type
entity.help: Parse RAW data(All Events) or failed error data of kinesis firehose stream to Splunk HEC.

entity.label: Parse all files as CSV
entity.tooltip: All files will be parsed as CSV with the first line considered the header.
entity.help: Set this checkbox to disabled for delimited files without a header.

entity.label: CSV field delimiter
entity.tooltip: Delimiter must be one character. The character cannot be alphanumeric, single quote, or double quote. Tab-delimited files will be \t. Space-delimited files will be \s

validators.errorMsg: Length of the delimiter is restricted to 1 character.
Delimiter must be one character. The character cannot be empty, alphanumeric, single quote, or double quote.
